title: Module 1: Understanding sustainability communication content
text:
Hello, There
This presentation will show you examples of what you can do with Quarto and Reveal.js, including:

Presenting code and LaTeX equations
Including computations in slide output
Image, video, and iframe backgrounds
Fancy transitions and animations
Printing to PDF

…and much more

title: web/ai-aided-content-analysis-of-sustainability-communication
section: overview of mooc course (ca 10 lessons x 3 hours work)
text:
overview of mooc course (ca 10 lessons x 3 hours work)

check list for setting up screen recordings

video lecture

open google chrome, access google isk account
go to microsoft teams, stream web app
start screen recording of google slides browser tab
start google slides in presenter view
read presentation script, stop screen recording
continue screen recording until done, finalize video



computer lab

open google chrome, access google isk account
go to microsoft teams, stream web app
start screen recording of google colab browser tab
execute jupyter notebook cells and explain, stop screen recording
continue screen recording until done, finalize video



prepare quiz

This is a Quarto website.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.
